title: Purchaser for value or lender
context: ยง510-26 Purchaser for value or lender. (a) If a surviving spouse has apparent title to property to which this part applies, a purchaser for value or a lender taking a security interest in the property takes the purchaser&rsquo;s or lender&rsquo;s interest in the property free of any rights of the personal representative or an heir or devisee of the decedent. (b) If a personal representative or an heir or devisee of the decedent has apparent title to property to which this part applies, a purchaser for value or a lender taking a security interest in the property takes the purchaser&rsquo;s or lender&rsquo;s interest in the property free of any rights of the surviving spouse. A purchaser for value or a lender need not inquire whether a vendor or borrower acted properly with respect to property to which this part applies. &copy; The proceeds of a sale of or creation of a security interest in property to which this part applies shall be treated in the same manner as the property transferred to the purchaser for value or a lender.
